profile:
Concrete Innovations is a concrete contractor offering friendly and reliable service to Calgarians since 2000. We use the highest quality products and guarantee superior workmanship. We pride ourselves on client satisfaction and value our long-standing relationships with our past, present and future clientele. CI offers a variety of concrete finishes including Exposed Aggregate, Stamped, Broom Finish, Smooth trowel finish, and Float Finish. These Finishes are also available in a variety of Colours.
We specialize in all types of exterior applications including sidewalks, patios, driveways and other custom projects. We also remove existing concrete, and offer a resealing maintenance package to existing and new clientele.

profile:
Tora Concrete Ltd. was founded in Calgary in 1989, and is still owned and operated by the original founder. The company has developed a reputation for excellent service and workmanship – adding beauty and increasing the value of many homes and businesses in the Calgary area over the past two decades.
 
Tora specializes in decorative finishes such as exposed aggregate concrete, stamped or decorative concrete, and broom-finished concrete – all in a wide range of colours. We work with the best suppliers and skilled craftsmen to create sidewalks, patios, driveways, steps and other concrete projects that reflect your style and vision, and complement your home or business.
name: Tora Concrete And Construction

profile:
Restore All Concrete Inc specializes in Concrete Restoration, Stamp Overlays, Floor Levelling, Acid Staining, Urethane Coatings, Structural Repairs, Crack Injections, Crack Repairs, Parging and Step Restoration. 

We have been in the concrete repair and restoration business in Calgary, Alberta for over 39 years. We have developed effective systems to restore and repair concrete floors, concrete steps and wall cracks using the latest products and technologies. 

We also offer a wide range of residential and commercial concrete finishing solutions including placing and finishing of exposed, stamped and broom finished driveways, patios and walkways, urethane and epoxy coatings, concrete staining, stamped concrete overlays, garage pads, retaining walls, curbing, steps and basement entrances. 

Our experience and expertise allows us to offer exceptional service to our customers.
services:
Repairs,
Floor Leveling and Restoration, Step Restoration, Coating and Treatments, Retaining Walls

profile:
Family owned and operated since 1975, the Johnny’s Concrete tradition in Calgary spans generations. We are proud to continue putting our substantial experience to work for you.

With decades of successful projects in the Calgary and surrounding area Johnny’s Concrete is proud to be the first name in concrete for all of your functional or decorative needs.

Every job is custom designed to your requirements and budget. We offer normal utility paving of sidewalks, driveways, and garage floors, or consider enhancing the beauty and value of your home or business with a modern aggregate finish, a colored pattern, or one of our eye-catching stamp designs.

Call us for a free design consultation and estimate from one of our knowledgeable staff. 403-899-1855

** Our Quality Commitment **

Our reputation for quality and professionalism is backed by our long-time accreditation with the Better Business Bureau of Southern Alberta, and by our own lifelong warranty.


Johnny’s Concrete stands by any defects of quality or workmanship on all work we do, and in most cases WE DO NOT REQUEST DEPOSIT OR INCREMENTAL PAYMENT TERMS. We usually don't ask for a penny until our work is complete and you are satisfied.

profile:
We offer competitive pricing for residential and commercial concrete services specializing in custom and decorative concrete. Homeowners, builders, and contractors — we want to be YOUR concrete services company.

Burmar Concrete Design Inc is a full service concrete company, serving Calgary, Alberta and its surrounding areas. From start to finish we provide any or all of the following services:

Break out of existing concrete

Excavation/waste removal

Form building/cribbing

Concrete pouring and finishing

Concrete Sealing

Patching/restoration
We do exposed aggregate finish, stamped finish, broom finish, concrete restoration, patching, patios, sidewalks, driveways, garage pads, basements, retaining walls, fire pits, swimming pools  — no job is too big or too small!

We pride ourselves in our work and want you to do the same. If you don’t see the service you’re looking for listed above, please contact us, because chances are if it’s a concrete service, we can help you.

Contact Us today to schedule your FREE estimate!
services:
Break out of existing concrete/

profile:
Hello! 
We are a family owned and operated concrete finishing company based out of Rockyford Alberta. Our company was established June 2022 but we are not new to the industry. With over 20 years of experience we can proudly say we provide our service with quality, care, and excitement no matter the project. Areas we service range from Calgary, Airdrie, Chestermere, Strathmore, Standard, Drumheller, and everyone in between! Our services include but are not limited to broom streak, exposed, and stamped flat work. 

We look forward to being your trusted tried and true go to concrete company!
